properties.title: A Little Chat About Money
properties.description: Notice sent to members to make prompt payments. Robinson tells his members that he believes in their unshakable integrity and that it must be carelessness that they don't make their payments, but it is important that the payments are received on time.
properties.creator: Robinson, Frank B.
properties.subject: Power  of God; Payments; Movement; Bills; Discounts; Expenses; Burdens; Obligations

properties.title: God - As a Living Spirit -Can Bring to You Perfect Abundance!

properties.title: Good News
properties.description: Radio program corresponding with transcript of Radio Psychiana - Series for Dr. Frank B. Robinson No. 3. Episode begins proclaiming the growth of Pyschiana and then takes listeners to Robinson's home in Moscow, Idaho, describing its appearance. A dialogue begins between a 'guide' and Robinson about miracles, healing, the God-Law, the mail Robinson receives, and the 'Life Impulse' or 'motivating spirit' that allows people to think and live with God.
properties.creator: The Izzard Company
properties.subject: God-Law; Life Spirit; Mircales; Healing; Sudent Letters; Testimonials
properties.publisher-digital: University of Idaho Library Digital Initiatives, http://www.lib.uidaho.edu/digital/

properties.title: Hang This Where You Can See It, Better Still - Frame It
properties.description: Flyer depicts a drawing of a large tree labeled 'The God-Realm' and the word 'You' beneath one of the branches. A caption reads 'The Unity and Peace of Power' and also explains that we all live linked to the great life of God and there is nothing more simple than that.
properties.creator: Psychiana, Inc.

properties.title: Here Is Your Lesson No. 3 - Man Can Now Talk With God
properties.description: Package includes introductory letter entitled 'Here is Your Lesson Number Three - To All Students.' Letter includes testimonial from a student whose sister's illness was healed. Tenney asserts this healing is proof there is no limit to the God-Power. Lesson 3 discusses the God-Law via various examples in nature (i.e. goldfish living with water all around them).
properties.creator: Tenney, C.W.
properties.publisher-digital: University of Idaho Library Digital Initiatives, http://www.lib.uidaho.edu/digital/

properties.title: Packet featuring atom bomb as volcano
properties.description: Packet with a series of materials, most of which are focused on how near earth is to destruction, employing the atom bomb and communism in particular. Includes history of the movement, testimony, advertisements for lessons, application for membership, and form envelopes. Also includes large mailer the packet was sent in.

properties.title: Quiet Talks With God - Proving God Lives in You
properties.description: Quiet Talks With God included a series of 101 newspaper columns written by Frank B. Robinson to communicate teachings of Psychiana. Column 4,'Proving God Lives in You,' discusses the miracle of birth and the fact that some Power takes over once a fetus is conceived. Robinson equates this to the power of nature and, therefore, God. This article is edited into columns on glossy paper with corrections in pencil.
properties.creator: Robinson, Frank B.
properties.subject: Psychiana Teachings; God-Power
properties.publisher-digital: University of Idaho Library Digital Initiatives, http://www.lib.uidaho.edu/digital/
properties.source: MG 101, Frank Bruce Robinson. Papers, 1929-1951, University of Idaho Library Special Collections and Archives
properties.rights: Educational use includes non-commercial use of text and images in materials for teaching and research purposes. properties.title: The Shepherd of Moscow, Idaho
properties.description: Article from Colliers Magazine provides a holistic view of Frank B. Robinson's life and Psychiana, including Robinson's travels before founding Psychiana, the development of the literature and doctrine, those who oppose and criticize Psychiana, and the financial success of Robinson himself.
properties.creator: Kobler, John
properties.subject: Robinson's Life; Psychiana Criticism; Robinson's Wealth
properties.publisher-digital: University of Idaho Library Digital Initiatives - http://www.lib.uidaho.edu/digital/
